thread.title: Great staff and location
thread.title_full: Great staff and location - Review of Residence Inn New York Manhattan/Midtown East, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: keith_emerson
title: Great staff and location
text: I stayed for a 2-week business trip. Found hotel's personnel were super helpful, specially during breakfast, Carlos had always good tips for NYC snow and places to visit. Breakfast service was exceptional, adding a lot a value to my staying. I personally recommend the hotel
